Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1977...
Traded from Minnesota to Boston (FBA) on 4/28/1978 (Going to Min: P N. Saez. Going to SHP: P F. Vosburg, RF J. Riddle)...
Injured on 5/8/1979 with a Spasms Back, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/31/1980 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 5/15/1982...
Had first career hit on 8/2/1982, off Scott Wiltshire (NE)...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/3/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $2,920,000 per year...
Traded from Syracuse to Northeastern on 7/20/1989 (Going to NE: P F. Vosburg. Going to SYR: 1B J. Chu)...
